title: I messed up a gift
body: I bought some RP (10$ worth) and wanted to gift Pug'Maw to my friend, but I accidentally (I know I'm dumb) gave him renektoy. So is there any possible way to refund that gift so that I can give him Pug'Maw instead?

replies.body: If it hasn't been very long since you sent Renektoy, and if your friend hasn't used him yet, reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can see if there's anything we can do!
